description: Bright and modern 1BR in the heart of Williamsburg. Balcony, washer/dryer in unit and new appliances in the kitchen. Close to the Marcy JMZ and Bedford L for easy access to Manhattan.
name: Bright and modern 1 BR in Williamsburg w/balcony
review: Fantastic place in a great location. Kevin was very helpful with tips and advice. The local bars are great! The key safe system is easy to use and the sound system and chrome cast came in very useful!
